title: 04-26-2021 Special City Council Meeting Attorney-Client Session (Audio Only)
transcript: good evening everyone please come to order welcome to the monday april 26th meeting of the special city council meeting in the city of delaware beach please join me for the pledge of allegiance please call the role council member robin hockey council member frank banker councilmember glenn gunn council member leslie otero councilmember rita swope here vice mayor dave gallis mayor joseph manzo city manager lynn reeves city attorney fred riley the only item that we have on this special meeting is an attorney client session to be held tonight at 6 p.m he has limited attendance to be included only as myself dave gaddis robin hockey frank bankford glenn gunn leslie materon rita smoked lynn reeves fred riley and randy mora is mr moore here i as am officer mr riley i'm going to bring this meeting as we're permitted under florida law into what's known as the shade um this is not going to be open to the public unless there's any objection i'm going to do that immediately mr riley yes sir it is now 6 56 in 46 seconds we are the shade meeting has concluded at this point now bringing the meeting back into the sunshine and we intend to conclude that before i do that i'm going to turn it over to our city attorney and all i want to say is we've had an attorney client session pursuant to section 286.011 [Music] and we are have concluded it and now we are concluding the special meeting that was called for this evening and that's it this meeting is now concluded except that 657 councilmember gunn has asked for a five-minute recess so we will let's just do it at 7.05 we'll start
